title: S. Walden - The Wilmington Saga 01- LoveLines
description:
Arrive at work at 7:58 A.M. sharp. Check. Count forty-seven steps to cubicle. Check. Arrange pens in their red-blue-black-green-purple order of importance. Check. Apply hand sanitizer before opening email. Double check.

And thatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s just the first few minutes of her work day.

Thirty-one-year-old proofreader Bailey Mitchell is a slave to her tics. She inherited Obsessive Compulsive Disorder from her father, and itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s done nothing but inhibit her love life. SheÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s run the gamut of boyfriendsÃ¢â‚¬â€none of them willing or able to cope with her condition.

Enter 32-year-old Reece Powell, her new coworker at Beach Elite Marketing Firm. HeÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s more than willing to cope. He finds her habits cute and quirky . . . for now. Reece wins her over, and life coasts along for them until Bailey experiences a devastating blow. Tragedy exacerbates her OCD, and Reece realizes her tics arenÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t so cute and quirky anymore. Just like all the others, he has the choice to leave.

But Reece isnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t like all the others.
